UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: N-terminal aromatic residues closely impact the cytolytic activity of cupiennin 1a, a major spider venom peptide.
Literature.Author: Kuhn-Nentwig L, Sheynis T, Kolusheva S, Nentwig W, Jelinek R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=10-20µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=20-40µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=0.625-1.25µM),Paracoccus denitrificans(MIC=2.5-5µM),Drosophila melanogaster(LD50=55.0nmol/g)
